SEARCH
Module se1.bestellsystem
Package components

Interface DataFactory

public interface DataFactory
Public factory-interface with create()-methods to instantiate objects of classes of the datamodel package from validated parameters. Objects are only created from valid parameters.
Version:
"F12-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT"
Author:
"sgraupner"

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    DataFactory.OrderBuilder
    Interface to build Order objects as a multi-step process using the builder pattern.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Optional<Article>
    createArticle(String description, long unitPrice, Pricing.PricingCategory pricingCategory, Pricing.TAXRate... taxRate)
    Factory method to create an object of class Article from validated arguments.

    createCustomer(String name, String contact)
    Factory method to create an object of class Customer from validated parameters.
    DataFactory.OrderBuilder

    Create DataFactory.OrderBuilder object used to build Order objects.

  • Method Details

    • createCustomer

      Optional<Customer> createCustomer(String name, String contact)
      Factory method to create an object of class Customer from validated parameters. The id attribute is internally provided. No object is created when arguments are not valid.
      Parameters:
      name - single-String name parameter, invalid if null or empty, example: "Eric Meyer" or "Meyer, Eric"
      contact - contact parameter validated as an email address containing '@' or a phone number, invalid if null or empty
      Returns:
      created Customer object with valid parameters or empty

    • createArticle

      Optional<Article> createArticle(String description, long unitPrice, Pricing.PricingCategory pricingCategory, Pricing.TAXRate... taxRate)
      Factory method to create an object of class Article from validated arguments. The id attribute is internally provided. No object is created when arguments are not valid.
      Parameters:
      description - brief article description, e.g. "Tasse"
      unitPrice - price of one unit (in cent)
      pricingCategory - pricing table associated with this article
      taxRate - rate according to Pricing.TAXRate (TAXRate.Regular is default)
      Returns:
      Article object created from valid arguments or empty

    • createOrderBuilder

      DataFactory.OrderBuilder createOrderBuilder(Pricing.PricingCategory pricingCategory, Function<String,Optional<Customer>> customerFetcher, Function<String,Optional<Article>> articleFetcher)
      Create DataFactory.OrderBuilder object used to build Order objects.
      Parameters:
      pricingCategory - pricing category used to build order
      customerFetcher - function to fetch Customer object from spec-String matching customer id, first or last name.
      articleFetcher - function to fetch Article object from spec-String matching article id or description.
      Returns:
      DataFactory.OrderBuilder object used to build Order objects
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - thrown by DataFactory.OrderBuilder constructor if arguments are null
